>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: Valid Superscript Markup

id:: td-000046

######################################################################

This document contains several examples of valid superscript markup.

One ^^word^^ is superscript in this sentence.

^^This entire line is superscript.^^

Only ^^two words^^ in this line are superscript.

This ^^paragraph^^ has several ^^superscript^^ words in ^^it^^.

<<<DOCUMENT
